about_the_game:
Casino World is a multiplayer casino RPG that provides the deepest, most satisfying casino experience around! Become a card shark in Texas Hold’em, a video poker whiz, or a slots champion. Compete in season challenges, enjoy live parties, try amazing avatars, dance moves, and so much more!

- Season challenges and special bonuses!
- Play all types of casino classics - slots, poker, horse racing, bingo and more!
- Play and party with your friends!
- Over 27 progressive and classic slots with unique reels!
- Build your own slots city and let it PAY YOU!

In Casino World you can earn free charms, gems & prizes. Every time you win in Casino World, charms boost your coin winnings.

Casino World allows you to be a Casino Tycoon! You can build your own empire and be the king of Vegas. After you spin to win, you can take your winnings and buy buildings that generate big payouts. Not only can you beat the house, you ARE the house!

content_descriptors.notes: Casino World is a Casino themed game intended for an adult audience and does not offer real money gambling or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at social gambling does not imply future success at real money gambling.

name: Casino World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 1.4 Ghz Dual Core Processor | AMD Athlon 3150U (APU)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 (integrated graphics) | Integrated AMD Graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Speed: 15 mbps download speeds or better.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10+
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.2 Ghz Quad Core Processor | AMD Ryzen 5500U or better
  • Graphics: Intel HD 530 or better (integrated graphics) | AMD Radeon R5 340x or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Note: We recommend having a machine containing a dedicated graphics card over any integrated graphics card.

short_description: Casino World is a massively multiplayer casino RPG that provides the deepest, most satisfying casino experience around. Compete in season challenges, enjoy live parties, try amazing avatars, dance moves, and so much MORE!
